26#pragma once
27
28#include "CachedResource.h"
29#include "CachedResourceClient.h"
30#include "Font.h"
31#include "TextFlags.h"
32#include <pal/SessionID.h>
33
34namespace WebCore {
35
36class CachedResourceLoader;
37class FontDescription;
38class FontPlatformData;
39struct FontSelectionSpecifiedCapabilities;
40class SVGDocument;
41class SVGFontElement;
42struct FontCustomPlatformData;
43
44template <typename T> class FontTaggedSettings;
45typedef FontTaggedSettings<int> FontFeatureSettings;
46
47class CachedFont : public CachedResource {
48public:
49 CachedFont(CachedResourceRequest&&, PAL::SessionID, const CookieJar*, Type = Type::FontResource);
50 virtual ~CachedFont();
51
52 void beginLoadIfNeeded(CachedResourceLoader&);
53 bool stillNeedsLoad() const override { return !m_loadInitiated; }
54
55 virtual bool ensureCustomFontData(const AtomString& remoteURI);
56 static std::unique_ptr<FontCustomPlatformData> createCustomFontData(SharedBuffer&, const String& itemInCollection, bool& wrapping);
57 static FontPlatformData platformDataFromCustomData(FontCustomPlatformData&, const FontDescription&, bool bold, bool italic, const FontFeatureSettings&, FontSelectionSpecifiedCapabilities);
58
59 virtual RefPtr<Font> createFont(const FontDescription&, const AtomString& remoteURI, bool syntheticBold, bool syntheticItalic, const FontFeatureSettings&, FontSelectionSpecifiedCapabilities);
60
61protected:
62 FontPlatformData platformDataFromCustomData(const FontDescription&, bool bold, bool italic, const FontFeatureSettings&, FontSelectionSpecifiedCapabilities);
63
64 bool ensureCustomFontData(SharedBuffer* data);
65
66private:
67 String calculateItemInCollection() const;
68
69 void checkNotify(const NetworkLoadMetrics&) override;
70 bool mayTryReplaceEncodedData() const override;
71
72 void load(CachedResourceLoader&) override;
73 NO_RETURN_DUE_TO_ASSERT void setBodyDataFrom(const CachedResource&) final { ASSERT_NOT_REACHED(); }
74
75 void didAddClient(CachedResourceClient&) override;
76 void finishLoading(SharedBuffer*, const NetworkLoadMetrics&) override;
77
78 void allClientsRemoved() override;
79
80 bool m_loadInitiated;
81 bool m_hasCreatedFontDataWrappingResource;
82
83 std::unique_ptr<FontCustomPlatformData> m_fontCustomPlatformData;
84
85 friend class MemoryCache;
86};
87
88} // namespace WebCore
89
90SPECIALIZE_TYPE_TRAITS_CACHED_RESOURCE(CachedFont, CachedResource::Type::FontResource)
91
